data.title: Mahabharat fame Pooja Sharma to play the lead in Maddam Sir 2
data.meta_description: Maddam Sir is one of the most popular shows that is all set to return. The comedy show kept audiences hooked to the TV screens and now its much-awaited second season will soon air. After the first successful season, there has been a high demand from fans for the new season. | Tellychakkar.com
data.text:
MUMBAI : Maddam Sir is one of the most popular shows that is all set to return. The comedy show kept audiences hooked to the TV screens and now its much-awaited second season will soon air. After the first successful season, there has been a high demand from fans for the new season. As per reports, there are speculations about the return of Maddam Sir season 2.

Also read - EXCLUSIVE! Maddam Sir’s Gulki Joshi talks about the show coming back for a season 2 says, “There hasn’t been an official confirmation yet”!

As per a report in India Forums, Pooja Sharma who is renowned for her role as Draupadi in Mahabharat show. She will reportedly play the main female lead in Maddam Sir 2.

Gulki Joshi will not return to the show and actress Bhavika Sharma who is seen in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin will also not be part of Maddam Sir 2. Yes, you read that right!

Pooja made her acting debut in 2012 with Teri Meri Love Stories. But, she gained a lot of popularity with her character as Draupadi in Mahabharata. She won millions of hearts with her role as Mahakali/Parvati in Mahakali — Anth Hi Aarambh Hai.

Also read - EXCLUSIVE! Maddam Sir’s Gulki Joshi talks about the show coming back for a season 2 says, “There hasn’t been an official confirmation yet”!

Maddam Sir was launched in February 2020 and became an instant hit. The show starred Gulki Joshi, Yukti Kapoor, Priyanshu Singh, Sonali Naik, and Bhavika Sharma in main roles. Makers of Maddam Sir will introduce new twists and turns in their second instalment and will keep audiences hooked to the screens.

For more news and updates from the world of television, OTT and movies, stay tuned to TellyChakkar.

Credits - Bollywood Life
